attributes.title: I wanted to see our rotten orange president🥺🥺
attributes.review: I’m so angry!! My phone was jammed for a month!! And they steal your food and toilet!! DONT DOWNLOAD UNLESS YOU DONT WANT TO EAT AND POOP OUTSIDE! It also showed my moms uncles dads cousins brothers moms dogs  crap

attributes.title: FAT POOP APP
attributes.review: THIS APP TASTES LOOKS SMELLS AND FEELS LIKE POO

I downloaded this in the belief that it would change my skin color. It did not btw. Now I am blue 😓 and I’m very unhappy. I rate this a 1 ⭐️ and if I could rate it negative I would😞 I’m sorry trumpie poo but it is what it is man. I also read that it uses your location.. I’m sorry sir🤚🏼 I am not ok with that🧚‍♂️🧖🏻. Anyways my pet gorilla 🦧and I went to the gas station to buy some clothes when all of a sudden I saw my trumpie poo. You were with Sofia the first😾👻💩👑 and it really hurt my feelings. Later that morning at like 5:00 pm I went to take a shower and ofc I brought my phone and so I hopped on animal jam and I saw someone trying to scam me👁👄👁. Their username was and I quote @trumpisbetterthanshrek385 this had me seriously offended since shriek is my mom.  I went to see how much v bucks they had and it was a lot. So I had guessed it was you. So I would like everything u scammed me for back. I already reported you to the fbi so it won’t be long. I’m sorry everything had to go down this way but like I said it iz what it iz😾🤏🏽🦧👁👄👁 sincerely- the one who’s skin is blue because of this app and is gonna rate it a 1 star.

attributes.title: This app screwed my wife and she didn’t even come
attributes.review: The second I downloaded this app my fridge was empty and my toilet was filled with unflushed poop. Very unsatisfactory would never download again

attributes.title: Worst app ever!!
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this app I opened it and suddenly this orange troll just popped up on my screen and my whole entire phone shattered!!🤭I even went blind in one eye.👁👄➖ I immediately took my phone to get fixed and unfortunately bc of this app the damages done to my screen were unable to be fixed😔 Atleast even with one eye I am still able to write this and warn everyone!! If I could give this -1748282 stars then I would✋🏽
